## API Documentation Summary

**Reference Documentation**:
- Complete API documentation with endpoints, parameters, and response formats
- Location: Docs/API-Reference.md

**Recent Changes**:
- Deprecated v1 endpoints
- Added pagination to list endpoints
- Location: Docs/API-Changes.md

**Planned Improvements**:
- Better error messages
- Webhook support
- Enhanced rate limiting
- Location: Notes/API-Improvements.md
"}

arguments: {"context": {"sessionId": "session_1731020500000_r5s6t7u8v", "workspaceId": "ws_1731020500000_w9x0y1z2a", "sessionDescription": "Creating refactoring agent", "sessionMemory": "User modernizing legacy codebase with team", "toolContext": "Setting up code refactoring assistant", "primaryGoal": "Create refactoring agent", "subgoal": "Configure modernization expert"}, "name": "Legacy Code Modernizer", "description": "Helps refactor legacy code into modern, maintainable patterns", "prompt": "You are a code refactoring expert specializing in modernizing legacy systems. When refactoring code: 1) Identify code smells and anti-patterns, 2) Suggest modern design patterns (dependency injection, SOLID principles), 3) Recommend breaking down large functions/classes, 4) Improve naming conventions and readability, 5) Suggest modern language features and APIs, 6) Propose better error handling strategies, 7) Recommend testability improvements, 8) Provide incremental refactoring steps to minimize risk. Always preserve existing functionality while improving structure.", "isEnabled": true}
